pages.text: $(li)The Notice Board allows you to insert into it different items to show text, draws, or $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/map)maps$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can interact with this block using a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/hopper)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/hopper)Hopper$(/l)$(/l).
$(li)You can insert a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/book_and_quill)Book and Quill$(/l) with writted text in its first page to show it.
$(li)You can insert a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/map)Map$(/l) into the Notice Board. This one will show it like an $(l:patchouli:decoration/quark/item_frame)Item Frame$(/l).
$(li)You can insert a $(l:patchouli:decoration/alexsmobs/banner_patterns)Pattern$(/l) into the Notice Board. This one will show the design of the Pattern inserted.
